author: Bellular News
description:
Go to https://ground.news/Bellular for 40% off unlimited access with the Vantage Plan - the best deal of the year for my subscribers and only available for a limited time! Sponsored by Ground.

The UK was just the start: EU, Australia, and US states are implementing similar laws, and developers are already facing tough conversations. Features are disappearing, and this is only the beginning.

Join us at http://bellular.games for early access content, 20 editions of 'Loading Screen' a month and to support our team!

title: The Online Safety Act Is Only The Beginning
